desc.p: This application is used to build a cross reference table for like fields in multiple applications.

For example, the application SC.SECURITY.CONSTRAINT application needs to check the TRANSACTION.AMT & TRADE.CCY when testing certain restrictions. A record can be created in this application called TRADE.CCY & various applications such as SEC.TRADE can be entered with the field name which refers to the trade currency.
This field stores applications which require a field to be cross referenced.
Valid T24 application stored in the PGM.FILE.
This field is used to store a description of the data stored in the record.
This stores the field name which is being cross referenced.

If an external appplication which uses this file for accessing data from records requires an entry in this record but the data type does not exist (E,g, TRANSACTION.AMT is not valid for POSITION.TRANSFER application) then the user can enter the text "NULL".
Valid field from the application stored in APPLICATION field.
